entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
